Producer: David Blocker, W. Mark McNair, David Willis
Distributor: West Video, Ecovideo [pt], Buena Vista Pictures, Les Films de l'Astre, Walt Disney Company Ltd. [gb], Warner Bros., Argentina Video Home, Tobis Filmkunst, Mikado, Budapest Film Rt.
Production Co: Rational Packaging Company, Summit Entertainment, Rain City, Flying Heart Films, Sugar Creek Productions
Synopsis: An unhappy car dealer (Bruce Willis) believes that a dime-store author/philosopher (Albert Finney) has the answers to life's important questions.
Title: Breakfast of Champions
